section.para: The ngx_http_auth_basic_module module allows to limit access to resources by validating the user name and password using the “HTTP Basic Authentication” protocol.
Access can also be limited by address. Simultaneous limitation of access by address and by password is controlled by the directive.

directive.name: auth_basic
directive.para: Enables validation of user name and password using the “HTTP Basic Authentication” protocol. The specified parameter is used as a realm. Value of the parameter can contain variables (1.3.10). The special value off allows to cancel the effect of the auth_basic directive inherited from the previous configuration level.

directive.name: auth_basic_user_file
directive.para:
Specifies a file that keeps user names and passwords, in the following format:
# comment name1:password1 name2:password2:comment name3:password3
